page.title: 09Sandall Park nr. Doncaster.
page.content: There are many places where you can go to enjoy yourself in our area. There are plenty of playing fields and a few parks. There is also a Sports Centre. The fields are small areas for playing things like football or just playing with your friends. Some fields have separate sections for people on their bikes. The parks have only small adventure places. There are swings, slides and roundabouts for young children. There is one enormous park called{Sandall {Park}- this park is full of activities like golf, boating, and feeding the ducks. It has an enormous lake for boating. There is a smaller lake for young children. Also there is a putting green. People go there with their dogs for a stroll. Unemployed teenagers spend some of their spare time there.
